purpose.value: This CodeSystem is develop to define SpecimenMaterial concepts that were not available in SNOMED International at the time of implementation of these codes. Meanwhile the code 433801000124107 (Combined nasopharyngeal and oropharyngeal swab) is added in SNOMED, which replaces the SMC0002 (Combined nasopharyngeal and oropharyngeal). The SNOMED code should preferably be used instead of SMC0002

display.value: Combined oropharyngeal and anterior nares swab
